body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park         Highland Light, Truro NPS photo     History & Culture Learn about the people and places that make up our past. Several history and culture reports are located here.           NPS photo  Nature  Birds, amphibians, mammals, marine creatures, and more!      News Press releases, park event information, and current (and archived) park newspapers  Photos & Multimedia Images, videos, podcasts, and virtual tours.           Science & Research Learn more about the science and research behind protecting Cape Cod National Seashore's plants, animals, and habitats.      Education  Learn how to plan a successful field trip to Cape Cod National Seashore, and see lesson plans to help your students connect to national seashore resources.  Kids & Youth Have fun learning about the park, and become a Junior Ranger!  Management Park planning, management reports, and laws and policies.
title: Cape Cod National Seashore: Learn About the Park
